post.author: 부기흡
post.content:
================
Download Boland JBuilder 9 Personal now! Speed coding and debugging with an integrated editor, debugger, compiler, refactorings, code formatting, build and configuration management tools, sample applications, and tutorials.

http://info.borland.com/03/jb1.html

================
There is also an open source version from http://www.eclipse.org.
Download Eclipse.

=================
Ok, there is another one from Sun Microsystems, and ... :-)
post.title: Major Java IDE Free Downloads
